WorkflowInfo.Name: Create new users in Azure AD from a predefined list
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><CreateMemoryTable x:Name="CreateMemoryTable1" activityLicenseType="1" id="291" name="CreateMemoryTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="4" TableName="UserDetails" RowNumber="3" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet> <xs:schema id='NewDataSet' xmlns='' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:msdata='urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata'> <xs:element name='NewDataSet' msdata:IsDataSet='true' msdata:MainDataTable='resultSet' msdata:UseCurrentLocale='true'> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs='0' maxOccurs='unbounded'> <xs:element name='resultSet'> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name='UserName' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /><xs:element name='FirstName' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /><xs:element name='LastName' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /><xs:element name='EmailAddress' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <resultSet><UserName>John</UserName><FirstName>John</FirstName><LastName>Smith</LastName><EmailAddress>John.Smith@ayehu.com</EmailAddress></resultSet><resultSet><UserName>Dexter</UserName><FirstName>Dexter</FirstName><LastName>Morgan</LastName><EmailAddress>Dexter.Morgan@ayehu.com</EmailAddress></resultSet><resultSet><UserName>Bill</UserName><FirstName>Bill</FirstName><LastName>Compton</LastName><EmailAddress>Bill.Compton@ayehu.com</EmailAddress></resultSet> </NewDataSet>" label="Create Memory Table" description="Creates a memory table." notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" /><GetRowsCount x:Name="TotalUsers" activityLicenseType="1" id="287" name="GetRowsCount" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="UserDetails" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" label="Get Rows Count" description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." notes="" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" Condition="{x:Null}" label="WhileActivity" notes=""><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ExitWhile IsValid="True" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" whileSequenceActivity="sequenceActivity1" name="ExitWhile" x:Name="exitWhile1" /><GetCellValue x:Name="UserName" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." notes="" /><GetCellValue x:Name="FirstName" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." notes="" /><GetCellValue x:Name="LastName" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." notes="" /><AzureADCreateAccount x:Name="azureADCreateAccount1" activityLicenseType="2" id="644" name="AzureADCreateAccount" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Creates a user" Description="Creates a new user in Azure AD" surname="%LastName%" givenName="%FirstName%" displayName="%UserName%" userPrincipalName="%EmailAddress%" password="PASSWORD" appId="APPLICATION_ID" tenantId="TENANT_ID" secret="SECRET" isAccountEnabled="Yes" forcePwdChange="Yes" TypeName="AzureADCreateAccount" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
